title: Police reform gets serious and Primaries churn; with Dave Weigel and Anna Palmer
description: Dave Weigel, Washington Post national political reporter, and Anna Palmer, Politico senior Washington correspondent and co-author of Politico Playbook join Chuck to talk about Senate Republicans unveil their police reform plan.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
